title: I want to write a story about an old video game. How should I approach to copyright owners to request permission and make a deal? - Quora

response.answer_text: Find the email address of the legal department, or call the reception desk and ask for the email of the legal department. Ask them if they could give you an approval for fair use. You’ll need to make a statement about what you plan to write and promise you won’t disparage or misrepresent the brand. Put everything in the same email. Resend if they haven’t replied. Keep copies of emails sent, and ask for electronic receipts. Make sure you have text checked by someone who can professionally confirm you’re not disparaging / misrepresenting.
Search for the contact info of that particular game production company and send an email to them about your deal.
